item.title: AutoTalker (it's actually my second...but it was a bit nooby so i put it here)
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

[SCAR]
if(HumanType=‘yuppers’)then
begin
repeat

SendKeysHuman(Msg+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg2+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg3+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg4+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg5+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))HumanTyper;
until(false)
end;
end.
[/SCAR] [br][size=1]Posted at: August 12, 2006, 07:10:49 PM[/size][hr]you need to enclose the if statement with begin and end;

item.title: AutoTalker (it's actually my second...but it was a bit nooby so i put it here)
item.dc:creator: @piddlefiddle piddlefiddle
item.description:
@piddlefiddle wrote:

well thank you, but ive made some changes…
[scar]//This is my second script
//My first one was an autologger
//oh…I am PiddleFiddle
//I have a file on www.moparisthebest.com
//oh…and I uhhh…I just made a stinkin pooter…yep, sure did.
//setup in lines 10-14.
//this is for people to learn from.
//do what you want just give me some cred if you post it, ok?
//im almost a pro…
//version 2
//i will do another version later…not like anyone cares…
//ITS A FREAKIN AUTOTALKER!!!noone uses em…i waisted like 5 hours trying to make it different
// all i wanted 2 do is practice and show people what i could do…maybe i could get some rep…
program AutoTalker;
const
//-------Setup------//
Msg= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg2= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg3= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg4= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg5= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
//DONT TOUCH ANY LOWER//
HumanType= ‘yuppers’;//DONT TOUCH!!!

{.include Squig.txt}

procedure HumanTyper;
begin
if(HumanType=‘yuppers’)then
SendKeysHuman(Msg+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg2+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg3+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg4+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysHuman(Msg5+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
end;
begin
if(HumanType=‘yuppers’)then
repeat
HumanTyper;
until(false)
end.[/scar]I worked like 5 hours on it and it wouldnt work so i gave up and just did this… :o

Read full topic

item.title: AutoTalker (it's actually my second...but it was a bit nooby so i put it here)
item.dc:creator: @piddlefiddle piddlefiddle
item.description:
@piddlefiddle wrote:

ok here it is…
[scar]//This is my second script
//My first one was an autologger
//oh…I am PiddleFiddle
//I have a file on www.moparisthebest.com
//oh…and I uhhh…I just made a stinkin pooter…yep sure did.
//setup in lines 10-14.
//this is for people to learn from.
//do what you want just give me some cred if you post it, ok?
//im almost a pro…not…a pro…whatever…ok…bye…are u ever gunna start it…
//or are u gunna read this the whole time…you’re a silly goose…wtf?..

program AutoTalker;
const
//-------Setup------//
Msg= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg2= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg3= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg4= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
Msg5= ‘’;//type message here, leave blank if you arent using
//—End of Setup—//
procedure Talk;
begin
SendKeysSilent(Msg+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysSilent(Msg2+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysSilent(Msg3+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysSilent(Msg4+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
SendKeysSilent(Msg5+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
end;
Begin
Repeat
Talk;
Until(false)
end.[/scar]

i told u it was nooby…just tell me if it works or not…and what the problem is…

Read full topic
